p: Regarding adaptive immunity, ω-3 PUFA have been reported able to improve the mitogen-mediated activation of immune cells and to promote the development of a TH2-type immune response [ 180]. Moreover, an increased production of associated anti-inflammatory cytokines like IL-4, in spite of a reduction of pro-inflammatory TNF-α, was found [ 180]. Similar effects were highlighted with both fish oil-enriched diets and the purified EPA and DHA [ 49].
